sources.title: Lucky Ducky (1940)
sources.description: Dinky is scared off by hunters, finding his way to a farmyard. There he tries to join a chicken family, but is rejected until he saves a chick who's fallen into a well. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/lucky-ducky-1940/

metadata.Plot: Dinky is scared off by hunters, finding his way to a farmyard. There he tries to join a chicken family, but is rejected until he saves a chick who's fallen into a well.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Tom Morrison
